entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 04:20 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with rain early this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
